title: A briefe and pleasant discourse of duties in mariage, called the flower of friendshippe
author: Tilney, Edmund, d. 1610.
publisher: By Henrie Denham, dwelling in Paternoster Rowe, at the signe of the Starre,
notes: At foot of title: Cum priuilegio.
Running title reads: The flower of friendship.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
